item.title: Parsing Query Parameters from URL using Google Apps Script
item.description: Gists This is a sample script for parsing query parameters from an URL using Google Apps Script. Also this can be used at Javascript. The process cost becomes a bit lower than that of the script using the regular expression. Sample script function parseQuery(url) { var query = url.split("?")[1]; if (query) { return query.split("&") .reduce(function(o, e) { var temp = e.split("="); var key = temp[0].trim(); var value = temp[1].trim(); value = isNaN(value) ?
